amendment.description: Amendment provides that any State that does not have a law which suspends the drivers license of a juvenile who illegally possesses or commits a crime with a firearm shall lose 10 percent of its juvenile justice funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 19 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to provide that any state that does not have a law which suspends the drivers license of a juvenile who illegally possesses or commits a crime with a firearm shall lose 10 percent of its juvenile justice funding.

action.text: Traficant amendment (A019) modified by unanimous consent. The modification strikes "25 percent" and inserts "ten percent".
On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A019) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
